topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Hundreds of EVM-compatible wallets were drained of over $107,000 in a phishing attack involving a fake MetaMask upgrade email. Security researcher ZachXBT flagged the suspicious activity, which involved victims receiving a New Year themed phishing email that funneled funds into a single address.
Sources:
- https://cryptoslate.com/hundreds-of-evm-wallets-drained-what-to-check-before-you-update

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Hacker group ShinyHunters claimed to have breached the US cybersecurity firm Resecurity, allegedly leaking internal system screenshots and employee data. However, Resecurity stated the hackers only accessed a fake honeypot environment and no real data was compromised.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackread.bsky.social/post/3mbjutcvtcs26
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackread.bsky.social/post/3mbk5mkfksk27

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A major malware attack is reportedly targeting Android users across 60 banks and financial institutions worldwide, resulting in drained bank accounts.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28475986/Hackers-Drain-Android-Users-Bank-Accounts-Target-60-Banks-and-Financial-Institutions-Worldwide-in-Major-Malware-Attack-Report
